column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Now that we've got the bloody mary in hand we're ready to peruse the menu. Start with the pintxtos platter - six little bites to get your mouth in shape for the serious consumption to come. They're phenomenal
column2: and appetizers are an important role in brunch. If you begin the main portion of your meal too soon you'll never make it back to the bloody mary bar for round two.
